name: Norder's Seal
description:
Norder's Seal is a tactical RPG I've been developing since the end of March 2022 (even though it's been on my mind for far longer than that).
There's not much content here yet, only a single area for you to beat with a group of 4 unique characters.

What's to expect?
- More content: More areas for you to beat, alongside 3 difficulties for each area, giving a lot of replayability for all of them.
- More characters: As you progress through the game you'll unlock different characters that you can use on your party. Considering the party size of 4, a lot of different compositions will surge with that.
- Better UI for area selection: As there is only one area currently in the game, The "UI" to select it is very very barebones, It's something that will obviously change in the future, but I guess why not include it here too, right?

For the game's name: There is lore significance to it, even though you can't really get anything from just this demo.

Consider joining my discord to leave feedback on a place I'll definitely read: discord.gg/9T4BARqmwv
Current version 1.0.3
